history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER transit directions
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 4 p.m. Today
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yeah.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 51 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Blvd of Allies at Duquesne Univ Footbridge.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:40pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Please repeat.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 51 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Blvd of Allies at Duquesne Univ Footbridge.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:40pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Second avenue at south 10th St Bridge. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER n u
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Can you?
TTS Take your time and let me know when you are finished.
USER I'm done.
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER Beatty continue
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER continue
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
USER n u
TTS Take your time and let me know when you are finished.
USER finished
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
USER finished
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
USER Heidi
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER Okay to continue.
